column4:
来やがったぜ、
マリオネーション・キラーが。

マリオネーションギアを倒す
ために作られた人形破壊機械。
column5: The killing machine created to destroy Marionation Gear.
column11: The killing machine created to destroy Marionation Gear.

column4:
お前が負ければ、人形都市を
止められるやつはいなくなる。
column5: If you lose, it means that there's no one who can stop the Puppet City.
column11: If you lose, it means that there's no one who can stop the Mech City.

column4: 最強の敵が来たようね。
column5: It seems your strongest opponent is on its way.
column11: It seems that the strongest opponent is on it's way.

column4:
とうとう
秘密兵器を使う時が来た。
column5: Finally, the time has come to use my secret weapon.
column11: Finally, the time has come to use my secret weapon.

column4:
/p！　ケイ！
この屋敷を使いなさい。

ハックスハウゼン屋敷は
強化されている。
column5: The Hackhausen Mansion has been reinforced.
column11: The Hackhausen Mansion has been reinforced.

column4:
敵にぶつければ普通の建物より
はるかに大きなダメージを
与えられるはずよ。
column5: If you hit the enemy with this, it'll do much more damage than any ordinary building.
column11: If you hit the enemy with this, it'll do much more damage than any ordinary building.

column4: 主人公＿操縦小さい驚きＬ

さあ、ハックスハウゼン屋敷を
利用して、戦いを有利に
進めなさい。
column5: Come, now! Use the Hackhausen Mansion to shift the battle to your advantage!
column11: Come now, use the Hackhausen Mansion to shift the battle to your advantage.

column4: ケイ＿むしゃくしゃするＬ

金持ちの考えることは
わかんねぇ……。
column5: I don't get how rich people think...
column11: I don't get how rich people think...

column4: アンマリー＿操縦やられ
